title: New: Porsches – HORSES
body:
NB.

Not the actual artwork.

Silky smooth debut track from Sydney duo **Porsches**, HORSES walks the line between the more dance orientated elements of Purity Ring, and the melodies of Passion Pit. Simplistic yet effective, it’s an assured and exciting first outing. Check it out below.
